name: blog_1
title: The battle between social media marketing and digital marketing
content_snap: In a world full of technology we all are aware of social media marketing and digital marketing. Social media is more of a blend of digital marketing. Social media services are more needed for Small and medium-sized enterprises.

name: blog_2
title: Everything you need to know about SEO
content_snap: One of the best ways to increase web traffic is Search Engine Optimization. SEO has become excellent competitive with over a billion blogs on the internet. It helps you to develop your search traffic and influence your niche.
